reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks expensive and flatters by hugging the body in all the right places, while also appreciating its stretchiness and good fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is absolutely stunning and far exceeded my expectation
items.body: I bought the Aigeman Women Vintage Flapper Dress for a special event. The beading and sequins are beautiful and look much more expensive than the actual price. It has just the right amount of sparkle without being over the top. The fit is very flattering – it skims the body nicely without clinging in the wrong places, and the length is perfect: classy, but still fun and flirty. The fabric has a nice weight to it, so it hangs well and doesn’t feel cheap or flimsy. I was able to move, dance, and sit comfortably all night long. I also really appreciated that it came exactly as pictured. The colors are rich, the fringe moves beautifully when you walk or dance, and I got so many compliments from friends and even strangers. People kept asking where I got it! If you’re looking for a glamorous, vintage-inspired dress for a party, wedding, or themed event, I highly recommend this one. Gorgeous style, great quality, and a very reasonable price. I would 100% buy it again in another color. Read more
items.author: Teri O'Brien

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for cocktail events
items.body: Great dress!!! Super impressed with the look and overall fit. The fringe adds such a nice touch and the brown color was great. Read more
items.author: Ange

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wrong Color
items.body: I saw several customers received the wrong color. I also received the dark brown when I order the lighter one. It’s still very pretty, but I was hoping for the other color. It fits greats and the quality material does fit the price. I’m 5”4” and weigh 160. I don’t think it’s worth trying to send it back because it appears they don’t have the lighter color, since the other customers continue to get the dark brown. Read more
items.author: Judith campos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the $$!! Beautiful dress!!
items.body: This is a well made, beautiful dress! Great for a wedding in guest outfit. I’m 5’3”, 127 lbs, & wearing a size small. I tried on with boots and the length was perfect! I’d would but this in another color! Read more
items.author: Christy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Wore this to a Western Formal wedding. Tons of compliments. Good purchase. Material was stretchy, but nice, very flattering. The color was exactly as pictured. The fit was perfect. It was wrinkled on arrival, but easily steamed out and endured a three hour trip with no added wrinkles. Worth every penny. Read more
items.author: Dana

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Seller needs to fix issue, dress is good though
items.body: Giving 3 stars because the dress is perfect. It’s the seller that ain’t. Ordered this coffee color THREE times and got the dark brown chocolate instead. There has to be an inventory issue that isn’t getting fixed sadly. I really wanted the Tan Coffee color! Read more
items.author: Simply Ella

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect western dress
items.body: Perfect for a western elegance feel. Wore for a photo shoot and would totally work for a wedding guest outfit. Read more
items.author: Raquel Peterson

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Recieved used dress
items.body: Exactly as pictured. Major issue: it came USED!!! It smells strong parfume , and cigarette smoke!!!! The armpits smell RANKKKKKK and deodorant stains!!!!! I’m SO LIVID THE WEDDING IS TOMORROW!!!!!!!!!!! Now I have NOTHING to wear except a $54 dress that’s used. I can wash it but I deserve some Type of refund for this nasty dress . Again, dress is cute and just like Pictured. But it was USED Read more
items.author: T

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress High Split Maxi Split Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress High Split Maxi Split Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Sky Blue, Chololate, Wine Red, Purplish Red, Purple, Reddish Brown, Royal Blue, Leopard, Black, Coffee, Khaki Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
